title: Essential Reading: Review of The Church and the Market by R.J. Ederer
description:
This week I'm reading Dr. Rupert J. Ederer's (lengthy) review of Tom Wood's 2005 book "The Church and the Market." Woods' book is popular among Catholics who feel the need to defend liberal capitalism against the criticisms of the popes.

Economics for Dummies - Rupert J. Ederer reviews "The Church and the Market"
http://culturewarsmagazine.com/2005/Ederer.html
